AI Description: libflame is a portable library for dense matrix computations, providing high-performance implementations of the BLAS and LAPACK interfaces.
Core Features: 1. Provides optimized implementations of BLAS and LAPACK functions. 2. Portable and easy to install. 3. Supports various architectures and compilers. 4. Offers a user-friendly interface for linear algebra operations.
General Tags: Linear Algebra, Matrix Computations, Numerical Computation
